title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 375-2.1 - Purpose; applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 375-2.1 - Purpose; applicability

State Regulations
(a) This Subpart applies to the development and implementation of remedial programs
at inactive hazardous waste disposal sites pursuant to ECL 27-1301, et seq. This Subpart addresses requirements in addition to those requirements
identified in Subpart 375-1. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
375-2.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
